data.name: git commit
data.description: Opens the commit editor to create a new commit

data.name: git commit -m "[commit_message]"
data.description: Creates a commit with a message

data.name: git commit -a -m "[commit_message]"
data.description: Stages and commits all files, with a message

data.name: git commit -i
data.description: Opens an interactive screen to pick the files to be committed
